item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world using Hugo ğŸ™‚ 1 2 def hello_world(): print("Hello world") Installing Hugo is pretty easy, but configuring Hugo is not easy at all ğŸ™‚. Anyway, here’s my blog. I try to write at least a post in a week or two, just to have here updated ğŸ™‚. Have a good time.
